title: Question about Braums shield.
body: Had a VERY good match last night as braum and i want to work him into my regularly ussd support champion pool. So regarding his shield... Does it block or reduce damage of attacks that go THROUGH it without being stopped? im thinking of things like lux ult, Draven ult, Ez ult, etc

replies.body:
Anything that would go through the shield will be stopped in its entirety. Braum tanks the damage/CC it gives, and the projectile goes away. However, as much as it is a skillshot, I don't think it blocks Lux Ults because it's not a projectile, per say. It's more like a long and narrow AOE spell that deals damage to anyone inside the laser. I don't speak from experience, but that's what I think when I envision it.

Hope this helps. Good luck!
